meanings.definition: A person who walks in space outside a spacecraft.
meanings.sent1: The spacewalkers floated gracefully outside the spaceship.
meanings.sent2: The spacewalkers wore special suits to protect them in space.
meanings.sent3: The spacewalkers waved to the aliens passing by.
meanings.sent4: The spacewalkers were like astronauts dancing among the stars.
meanings.sent5: The image of the spacewalkers against the vast darkness was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The act of walking in space outside a spacecraft.
meanings.sent1: Watching the spacewalkers on TV was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The spacewalkers completed their mission with precision.
meanings.sent3: The spacewalkers decided to have a picnic on the moon.
meanings.sent4: The spacewalkers' journey symbolized human exploration.
meanings.sent5: The spacewalkers' adventure was filled with wonder and danger.
